Section.Heading: Computing strongly Shoda pairs

Attr.Name: StronglyShodaPairs
Attr.Comm: A list of representatives of strongly Shoda pairs which realize the Wedderburn components of QG realized by strongly Shoda pairs

ManSection.Returns: A list of pairs of subgroups of the input
ManSection.Description: Computes a list ssp of strongly Shoda pairs of the finite group G given as input such that every Wedderburn component of the rational group algebra QG over G realizable by a strongly Shoda pair is realizable by one member of ssp (see ).
